alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Collier and northeastern Hendry Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 654 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Devils Garden, or 9 miles southwest of Montura, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montura, Devils Garden and Harlem. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Hendry; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
